son, "Now, if you would only 
help a bit! I must have singers too. I shall have my own orchestra, but shouldn't we get the gypsy singers as well? You military men like that sort of thing." 
"Really, Papa, I believe Prince Bagrati6n worried himself less before the battle of Schon Grabern than you do now," said his son with a smile. 
The old count pretended to be angry. 
"Yes, you talk, but try it yourself!"
